name: Aliya's Ascent
description:
Welcome to Bridgeworld


Aliya’s Ascent is a character-driven, interactive adventure story filled with amazing cinematic elements about a girl who mysteriously found herself in the middle of a boat towards an unknown land. Embark on a journey in the world of the first Legions, meet familiar faces as you unravel the tales that made the fabric of Bridgeworld & Treasure, every choice you make matters.

Aliya’s Ascent is based on the Treasure’s 7-part Bridgeworld community-novel Aliya’s Ascent, also available in Audiobook format.

Features
Fully illustrated story
Complete voiceovers
Multiple Endings
50+ Unlockable Gallery Images
Gallery view unlocked in the game

Trigger Warning
Death
Violence

Larger World of Treasure
Aliya’s Ascent is just a part of the larger world of Bridgeworld, a game in the Treasure Ecosystem.
